io.micronaut.graphql

Class GraphQLFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.graphql.GraphQLFactory

  • @Factory
 @Requires(property="graphql.enabled",value="true",defaultValue="true") @Requires(beans=graphql.GraphQL.class)
public class GraphQLFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creating the GraphQL-related beans.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcel Overdijk
